meanings.sent1: I am tired, sith I will go to bed early.
meanings.sent2: She was happy, sith she received a gift.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed, sith it wanted food.
meanings.sent4: The rain poured down, sith the clouds were dark.
meanings.sent5: He ran fast, sith he was late for the bus.

meanings.definition: Sith: a noun referring to a fictional order of dark side Force users in the Star Wars universe.
meanings.sent1: Luke Skywalker fought against the Sith.
meanings.sent5: The Jedi battled the Sith in an epic duel.
